title: New: Honeyblood – Killer Bangs
content:
Killer Bangs, the new track from Glaswegian duo Honeyblood is razor sharp sugary rock and perfectly encapsulates the sound of these “Noisy Scottish Girls” in a neatly bound two minute package.

With straight up guitar and drums and an enormous chorus, Killer Bangs ensures Honeyblood will be the next fledgling young artist to fly the flag for the city.

Stream Killer Bangs below:
